name: Escape From The NIGHTMARE! 1.6
description:
In this game you must collect 5 golden keys to open the master door which is firmly sealed and escape from this place, BEFORE YOU... In this update added :
  1. Graphic Settings
  2. Game Volume Settings
  3. Add Some Quality Level (Android & PC)
  4. Add Walk & Idle Camera Animations
In this update fixed :
  1. Fixed Some Bugs
NOTE: In this android game update, the game data will be reset, because the developer of this game changed the data path of this game... !DOWNLOAD NOW! !Available on Android & Windows! Support Android 4.4 - Android 11! Game Update 1.6 Trailer :
